about_the_game:
Lady Godiva is immersed in her relentless quest for vengeance and justice, an epic tale unfolding across two distinct periods of time, intertwining in a mysterious and captivating manner.

1429AD (Original)



In the first period, set in a distant and turbulent past, emerges a powerful and fearless female figure, whose true name remains shrouded in mystery. Known to some as the Naked Warrior, her resemblance to the legendary historical figure who rode naked through the streets of a small village makes her even more striking.




Focusing on this enigmatic past, we are introduced to a chaotic and oppressive scene, where this extraordinary woman emerges, wielding her sword against adversity, completely devoid of clothing, mounted on her majestic horse. Her destiny and motivations remain hidden, but her determination and courage are unquestionable, defying cold or heat without ever covering herself.

2129AD (DLC)



However, in the futuristic setting, Lady Godiva takes on a new form, riding a sturdy motorcycle, still unclothed but now adorned only with transparencies, maintaining a minimal appearance of decency. In this future version, she transforms into a ruthless and seductive bounty hunter, ready to destroy any obstacle that dares to cross her path. Her mission persists, now in pursuit of the same coveted relic from bygone times. An intriguing detail pervades both eras: Lady Godiva's unique ability to wield a sword, demonstrating an impressive skill that transcends the boundaries of time, whether in the past or the future.



This is a visual novel. You just need to continue browsing the story using the mouse. You can opt for automatic reading or you can simply click to go to the next scene. It is possible to save the game both automatically and to the scene of your choice. This game also has an image gallery.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains continuous nudity and explicit sex scenes. The main character is completely naked throughout almost the entire game because this is a characteristic of Lady Godiva. There are scenes containing sex and bodily fluids.

name: Lady Godiva

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz, AMD A10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz, AMD A10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Lady Godiva is immersed in her tireless quest for revenge and justice. In the first period, set in a distant and turbulent past, a powerful and fearless female figure emerges, whose true name remains shrouded in mystery. She, however, is confused with the legendary historical figure who rode naked.
